content.detailedDescription: It was the middle of the night i was lying in bed with my two young children my husband was working at nighti heard a noise about a car pulled up in the driveway and i saw lights through the window so i peeked through the curtainthere was no car in the driveway but there was light in my yard so i looked up and that's when i saw itit was a sideways oval shape but it had sharper edges around the middle towards the bottomthe sharp edges had multi color lights that look like large bulbs that change colors the bottom of it was kind of like a glowing light there was also light coming from inside of it through it look like a cloudy window where i saw two beingsthat's when i suddenly felt very terrified for me and my kids and i stopped looking for a minutebut then i was curious and i looked back out the window and i felt like they were looking right at mewhatever it was it floated upwards in a straight shot really slow then it just took off like a fresh and it was gone in about 10 seconds later three big huge double bladed helicopters went over my house towards the direction that it was goingthe next day my husband was gone working in tobacco a man pulled up in my driveway in a suit he was in a jeep it was silver and white look like it was brand new he got out and i open the door but i didn't unlock the chain and i said how can i help you and he stopped walking towards my house and he had a big black bag in his hand i said how can i help you again and he said i was hunting this morning and i saw a bird i think it flew in the woods over here on the other side of your driveway do you care if i go look for it i was scared so i said no go ahead and i shut the door and locked itsome time passed the man came back out of the woods i open the door just a crack and he started towards my house so i shut the door he threw up his hand and yelled thanks and he got in the jeep and as he turned back out and leave my house i saw his tag said govt 00000 i never told anybody about my family because i didn't want people to think i was crazy
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Heard noise.Saw light.Look out windows.Saw craft.Watched.Flew away.3 helicopters followed.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work, it was around 12:15 am on may 1st 2015. i got to the top of a hill that over looks the lake i live on. about 4 miles away from my house. i right away noticed a very bright and distinct light just hovering over the lake that i live on. it was in the shape of a square and it was brighter than a star, only a few stars in the sky that night. as i got closer and closer it still was not moving at all, so i rolled my windows down and turned off the radio to listen to see if i could hear anything like a helicopter. nothing, i could not hear a sound at all. so i kept driving closer thinking it was one of those balloons people light up and let off into the sky. once i got close enough to be right under it (however i was on the road and it was over the lake to my left) i saw that it was some sort of an aircraft. however it was in the shape of a diamond. it had the large square light so bright on the front peek, the outer 2 peaks had flashing red lights on them and the back side had a flashing white and green light. it was lower than any plane i had ever seen fly in that area. it slowly started to fly over my head and back north down where i had just come from as i drove under it. still making no sound at all. when i turned around to try and get a good look it as gone into the darkness. i took two photos on my phone, but when i went to show my father the next day they were not there (not sure if while i was driving they didn't come out or what happened).
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: Bright square light larger than plane hovering over lake. once got close saw shape of object and it quietly/slowly flew away

content.detailedDescription: It was just not moving.... it was just like a bright star..!!~~ it was permanent there.. & not moving ..!!~~~ it was looking like that it was sticken at that position only!!! it was just like a star .. but was extremely bright!!! and the strange thing is that it showed some weird strange activities from the sky....!!~ when i tried to click it's photos from my normal phone.., it just do not allowed me to click it photos.. when i was trying to photo shoot it .. it was just dancing & moving here & there on my phone screen.. it was completely weird..!!~ it was just like the other permanent star.. but actually was looking like the ufo-star craft!!~
content.summary: I just saw a star-like ufo strange sighting in the sky in the gogal, margao at the place where i leaves...!!~

content.detailedDescription:
Finish work at 2:30am and coming back to the shop. i see in the sky just right to the moon a big white light slowing down fast, i can see at the back like white grey flames. or it was the effect of the slowing down of the object. the object did a u-turne fast and go down in a straight line, like if it hit a wall and fall down. it's not the first time a see these white light go down, it's the third time. usually it's in the air like a star and fall in a straight line.
but this time it move from left to right stop fast make a u-turne going down in a straight line. i was surprise and try to estimate the distance. i think it was between 2 and 4 miles. the object was 1/6 the size of the moon that day, so maybe between 30 and 100 ft maybe more. it was white grey, not hard to look at. not fuzzy, but round clear cut white grey. 
i work at night, and on the road, so i have to look quick and have quick reflex. it was just less than a minute but there is no doubt in my mind, something or somebody make that thing stop and go down. i did not see a light on the ground, police or firemen. it was the night and to far the pin point exactly were it was.  
this thing, like the others lights, i have to insist so that you can understand. did not fall like a meteorite gradually on a long distance by the gravity and disperse in the atmosphere. 
imagine to see it falling down from  5000 feet in a straight line to the ground in 3 secondes.
not going left and right, but a clear cut white grey light, that fall at the same speed if you drop a ball to the ground. 
the other night, i dont remember the date but it was in march 2015, when a arrived home, it was 3:10am. there was, far in the night sky, maybe 30 000 feet, a similar light, white grey clear cut light pulsating. it was ovale in shape and was going straight over my head . 2 secondes intervals between the pulsating. it was big. i look at it 2 minutes before the clouds hide it.
content.summary: Light make and u-turne

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of nice sunny day in the city. i took like 4 of the sun when i noticed in one of them i had this red orb like object on it. i found it interesting but really didn't pay much mind to it. but something told me to save them, especially the one with the object on it.  so this morning after the nfl draft i went on the net to the new york post sports web site site. when i finished reading on our pick i saw a story on the bottom that read. ufo spotted in nyc bronx or something to those lines when suddenly i saw the picture first and i couldn't believe my eyes. i was totally blown away. i noticed that i took a picture of the the same exact object. i was stun frozen. i quickly went to my phone to confirm and there it was, the same object only i had captured it on wednesday and the bronx reporting was the previous saturday. i didn't know what to make of it but i knew someone would be interested and maybe have an explanation. to clarify, i never saw the object visually, i just happen to catch it by chance.
content.summary: I didnt see it visually. i took a pictire and caught it by random.

content.detailedDescription: Wife noted high-frequency sound beginning about 3-1/2 weeks ago both inside the house (louder during sightings) and outside. beginning april 28, 2015, the sightings have been observed for 3 nights so far (clear sky each night). multiple triangles observed simultaneously for several hours starting about 10pm until 3 am. observation with binoculars revealed pulsating,varied colored light (red-blue-green-white) in circular motion within circumfrence at each side of triangular shape when the rotation of the triangle was facing us. triangular shapes were at various rotations throughout the sighting times. the pattern has been the same so far, except we became aware of multiple (4) triangular shapes on the 30th of april as we began to search the sky further. rotation seems to be anywhere from 1 dimensional triangular shape as 3 equal length sides, to 1dimensional triangular shape with unequal length sides--as if rotated towards "edge" surface of triangular shape. observation was from inside house or on porch. objects caught wife's attention when pulsating bursts of colored light seen with naked eye, then with binoculars. ufo similar to description as viewed on hangar 1 programs. amazed to view so many objects simultaneously (appearing at varius altitudes and rotations during "orbit" for several evenings and will continue to look for them. sound seems to only be interference picked up by wiring or electronics in and near house and barn (also has electrical wiring)--sound continues after electrical panel main switch has been turned off. sound seems to be similar to that of 1000s of insects in a meadow during summer--also in sync with the way the lights pulsate. we took photo with ipad camera but noted interference (snow-like as on early years of black &white tv viewing) before cable/satellite. lost sightings only due to retiring for evening for sleep.
content.summary: Seems to have regular flight pattern for several evenings e to se

content.detailedDescription:
I saw the first one at dawn this morning

i have watched the sky since i was a child i know what stars planets satellites look like

tonight there was an array of them in varying apparent sizes about 2 to 3 arc seconds wide and long

most oriented the same way by the point of the triangle

there was no motion they were fixed with the stars.

i was just outside looking up

you can't miss them they are everywhere

lost sight with cloud cover

i began to freak out after my roomie saw all of them too

looks like at least 3 stars together some more

extremely bright

this is not a joke they are still up there
content.summary: 14 star like triangular objects fixed with stars in all parts of the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in my driveway observing the moon. i noticed a bright object come off the southern pole. it then moved to the right of the moon. i ran into my house and grabbed my camera and tripod. took 1 min. set up camera and tripod ad started taking pics. the object then did an orbit around the right side of the moon and then moved north until gone.

i think it was a star but the only thing out that was bright enough to see with the naked eye was venus and jupiter. denebola, vindemiatrix, porrima were not visible. this object was brighter then jupiter and venus. i don't know what it was. it was probably a star but it sure looked like something took off from the moon, orbited and then took off. i have 40 photos in a sequence. it only took about 3 to 5 minutes for it to orbit so it seemed really fast. i tried all different shutter speeds to try and get a good pic.
content.summary: Bright object around went around moon

content.detailedDescription: It was a really nice day, and i went up to hummock hill to take a picture of the foreshore beach area to send to a friend. i took a panoramic shot from left to right. when i got back to my computer, and uploaded the photo, i realised there was something in the middle of the shot. i hadn't noticed it at the time of taking the photo. upon closer inspection i could see what appeared to be a vapor-cone (thanks google)at what i assumed to be the back. can't say why i thought it was the back, as i didn't see anything with my eyes. but from the picture it appears to be moving from left to right.
content.summary: I was taking a photo of the beach area, and when i checked the image on my computer i noticed the anomoly

content.detailedDescription: Camping just outside of warm springs recreation area,5 miles from anaconda,mt alone i set up my new camera and tripod. i camp at least 4 times a week and see unexplained lights every night now. so often i bought the camera to document their appearances. i soon realized i was being surrounded by coyotes, as they circled me and cackled. they always make me nervous alone, so i put the tripod back in the car and grabbed my bear spray. i picked up a large stick and smacked it against a tree three times, so hard the last one broke the stick and the sound reverberated up and down the mountain valley. the coyotes continued their encroachment so i started making lots of noise and howling at them. around 10 pm with the dogs still bothering me, i looked out in the western sky and a star like light that was orange appeared to be traversing nw and it got bright orange and faded out. excited as always, i waved and said "hi guys", like i always do, sometimes the light blinks in response but this time a sound, like and electronic pulsating force invisible force was headed directly at me. it came over my head and i ducked in primal fear, i can't really describe the wicked way it sounded, it sent fear from the bottom of my spine to my brain, adrenal glands dumping fully. i was dumbfounded at the sound that just flew over my head. i ran in a small circle and tried to open my car but fear made my hands weak and dumb feeling, i couldn't open the hatch! feeling watched i spun around in the direction of the moving star and exclaimed "was that you guys?" and there was a flash of orange that sent my hairs erect and my heart pounded in my throat! the star like light ten went slowly left then right and i clenched my bear spray, feeling very exposed and very alone. i watched that light in silence, with the dogs cackling again, when the sound had come they fell dead silent. i watched the light move back and forth for a half hour then retired to my car and watched the light from inside for another half hour before i fell asleep. i have never had such a personal experience. i am humbled, but i am going back for more documentations and will list all new experiences here.
content.summary: Star like orange light appeareared and got brighter. i waved to it and some sound was projected flying over my head

content.detailedDescription: Boyfriend and i were driving on the 91 fwy towards newport. saw what i thought was an airplane. but it was all white. it appeared to be flying. it stopped. it then began vibrating. the whiteness of it started to dissipate and then it just disappeared. i kept looking for it. three minutes later a white orb was heading in the same direction as the white ufo. then another one came from the other side. both of the orbs then aligned with eachother in the same spot the white ufo was and then they both disappeared. the orbs appeared to be spinning in a circular motion and the both appeared to have a light. i could not believe what i saw. the white ufo looked exactly like an airplane. it caught my attention because i thought it was an airplane but it was cloud like. then the vibration, and as fast as it appeared it just disappered. there were no clouds in that particular area. blew my mind.
content.summary: White airplane like ufo hovered in sky and disappeared. two white orbs followed

content.detailedDescription: The first time there was no movement. about an hour later was talking to neighbor outside and told him to look up but he didn't. i don't know why it wasn't reported but i heard nothing about it. it was very large, broad daylight and was shinny on the bottom in a half saucer shape and then the sides squared off at a slight angle, flattened out with a square coupola everything but the bottom was burnt orange. i didn't feel any particular emotion. i have had sightings since the mid 1960's. have been a coast listener since the 1st part of 1988. i saw one other that was the same shape only much larger. it was at dusk and a dull grey and two orbs came out of it and then returned. i called my son out but by the time he saw it it was just starting to rapidly assend. he's not really sure if he believes in them or not. this is the 1st time i have reported a sighting. very few people take it seriously and i gave up on talking about them. i have listened to and enjoy your reports. i am a disabled vietnam vet on a limited income so am not able to make a donation although i certainly would if i could. i lived with the lakota sioux on the pine ridge reservation with the red cloud family for 5 years and learned so much about their beliefs. ufo's and aliens are very much a part of their and every other native culture i've been introduced to. feel free to contact me if you like. keep up the good work.  harry  p.S.  i try to keep a camera with me at all times now.
content.summary: Very clear. !St time it blinked on and 6 min. later blinked out. 2nd time blinked on moved 500' and blinked out.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog when i saw it, i'm not sure what made me notice it but when i did i just thought it was a star. as i watched it, it began getting brighter and two orbs split off from it kind of like a sliding motion. the brightest of the three started to slowly move and i'm not sure why but i decided to follow it. it went passed at least two buildings and a street. i honestly felt curious about what i saw, as i followed it i decided to try and get a picture of it. i took three pictures but only one of them turned out well enough to see due to the fact i had zoomed in with my phone when i looked at the picture i saw a basic outline of what ever it was. when i lost the orb from my sight it didn't move it just slowly vanished as if nothing was there to begin with.
content.summary: Orb like object split into three objects, was bright like a star.

content.detailedDescription: I was doing the dishes and the sink is right in front of the window. i was looking outside absent-mindedly when i noticed a bright orange object suddenly appearing out of nowhere in the sky, moving slowly from north to south west. the sun had just set and the sky was sort of dark blue. there were no stars to be seen, as it was cloudy (rained earlier but not at time). when i first saw it i felt something like a knife stabbing into my heart, i ran outside. i was very excited!! that was when the object was closest. it was sort of saucer shaped with a dome?? on top. i watched it go horizontally and then disappear in a blip. it then reappeared more to the west after about 10 seconds. it was hovering. i ran inside, yelled for my brother and told him to grab his phone. we went outside and it was still hovering there!! we both filmed it as it was stationary. it then slowly disappeared/disintegrated as you can see on the videos. our mobile phone cameras arent really good, it looked way more orange and bright (you know this from taking pictures of the moon!!) we were both in awe. one or two other people were watching from their balconies too. the object was hovering for about 2 minutes but it felt like forever. after that it reappeared once more, way more to the west and went straight up and disintegrated. we didnt see it again, and it looked further away when we saw it last. we are still very excited. my little brother is scared now. the second video was taken with an iphone so it's not as good but if you zoom in you can see it. we were able to film it when it was hovering.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo seen in switzerland

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in a room one minet the next in a dark natal room looking out a window from space a big window the size of a bay window and the sight i saw i was beside myself because it was a massive planet but it was pitch black inside and all around the edge was like the sun i believe i was looking at a eclipse of the sun i could also hear the sound of the ship whoop, whoop, whoop over and over but not loud at all just very eerie i also didn't see anyone else in this room with me all of a sudden snap i was back in the room siting there unbelievable to me because i couldn't get over what had just happened to me i'm willing to take a lie detector test go under hippos what ever i can do to get to the bottom of what had happened please help thank you.
content.summary: I was in the ship looking at what a pairs to be a eclipse of the sun from a bay window

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from a job, getting close to my destination i noticed a bright light hovering in the sky.  the sky was still pretty bright, but i dismissed it as a star and kept my eyes on the road.  the passenger noticed it as well and he described it as shiny silver metal and it  disappeared.

this seems like the same ufo i have observed 2 times prior, making it the 6th sighting for me.
content.summary: Bright oval light, second witness observed it turn silver and dissapeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a picture of cloud cover and this thing appeared on the picture .... i have never seen with my own eyes.

are you able to help me?
content.summary: Look like lightning

content.detailedDescription: As i was outside looking at the moon thru my telescope, then my brother arrives home and i show him juipter, which was on the west side of they sky. and as my brother was looking thru the telescope i notice something on the corner of my right eye. and as i look at it directly, i just froze because i knew what exactly it was. the craft was bommerang-shaped, but instead of the curves they were pointed and shaped like a triangle. the bottom of the craft had 6 big dim lights, 3 on each side. if you weren't lookin at the sky you would've not noticed it. i tell my brother to look and he also couldn't believe what he saw. i kept telling him, "are you seeing what i am seeing? this can't be real." and my heart was racing what i was looking at and i had no thoughts of taking out my phone to take a picture of it. we were looking at it a least for a good 10 seconds before we then couldn't see it because the lights got dimmer. it came from the  after it ended i just stared at my brother. my brother tried to come up with an explanation about it, such as a military plane. but for it to be low and make no noise, that's not military whatsoever.
content.summary: Boomerang shaped, dim lights

content.detailedDescription: First notice a bright light in the window while i was watching tv i thought it was a helicopter and search light but the light was to bright to be so along with this bright object are several other objects with it of various light color ( red,blue and white appearing to pulse twinkle on the april 25th while i was observing the smaller bright pulsing object one of the objects dropped low behind a bush and tree as i was trying to make out what it actually looked like at a closer distance it would peek in and out of the darkness of the night and bushes of trees i got two short glimpses and it appeared to be a kind of glowing green hid halo lens type object then all of sudden the object shot across to further left of my bedroom window stopped quickly then shot straight up to the sky i did notice the object could cut off its light and then cut it back on to glow bright white at this exact time of this particular event a thunderstorm began to roll into the area and all the glowing objects left the area last being the largest brightest of the objects the event has left me kinda shaken also while these events i see them my stomach becomes kinda upset the objects come on a nightly bases when the sky is clear i have decided not to observe these objects so closely anymore for it disturbes my reason of what it could be
content.summary: Observe white bright glowing twinkling object to the top left of my bedroom window object was stationary then slowly descend behind a tree that directly across from bedroom window

content.detailedDescription: I was on vacation in montana in june 2014. i took some photos with my iphone at spring meadow lake state park in helena, mt. i then downloaded them to my computer. i was looking at the pictures recently on my computer and i noticed a black dot in the middle of the clouds in the one horizontial photo. when i zoomed in it looked like a oval shaped object. the wierd thing is that i have another photo that i took veritcally directly after taking the first one and that black object is not in the photo. i also have some more photos of the area before and after and i don't see any obects in the sky. while i was actually there on vacation, i didn't notice the object. at the time i did not notice this object; i just noticed it today when i was deleating old photos on my computer.
content.summary: Object in the clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was opening my house front door leading onto the porch which over lookef my property's paddock and i instantly saw it above the treeline between 30-50 degrees in the sky, night time. lasted for about 5 seceonds. the bright white orb quickly moved from right to left to right, pausing for half a second in each direction then flew away at a speed i've never witnessed. incredibly fast. i also saw various other similar objects at a further distance higher in the sky (this was at night about 10 minutes after lasting for an hour) move erratically and in organised and exact triangular formation. clouds left streaks in the sky in a pattern never seen before. clouds also left and moved extremely quickly (like close encounters of the third kind) when the ufo disappeared over the horizon.I felt in awe. static. emotional. scared but obsessed. the most amazing feeling.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Quick, defied physics, went from right to left then right, stopped then flew off extremely fast

content.detailedDescription: I told my friend. i saw a ufo last night. she asked me where did you see it? i say "here," and i pointed the sky and  we saw an ufo at that time. we only saw objects in 3 or 4 seconds. it's has light's but not shape. lights colors is orange.
content.summary: I told my friend. i saw a ufo last night. she asked me where did you see it? i say

content.detailedDescription: I was walking near chandler high school in chandler, arizona when i looked up and saw an oval shaped object flying above me. the object was dark gray and very metallic in the afternoon sun. the object was strange as it was spinning while flying fast. it kept on spinning around the entire time i observed it.
content.summary: A dark gray, metallic oval shaped object was spinning while flying towards the east

content.detailedDescription: As i am going to take a movie to the reafbox in family dollar on ingalls and eden st i see a aircraft above the houses that are in front of the the family dollar... i asked my friend if he saw it to a this moment i'm going like 5 mph or less just trying to observe it it was round had a lot of small lights all around it.. it went into a vertical position and the lights started to do some weird flashing lights almost as if it was acclerating to take off it did it for like 5 to 8 sec and it vanished heading sw... when it vanished it was almost movie like it just took off and dissppeared. i went all around my town to see if i could spot it around my town but i had no luck in finding it... also the location is near the beach
content.summary: A hovered aircraft ready to take off and then dissappeared heading sw

content.detailedDescription:
This objects was observed by numerous people passing along the highway. north of philippines pampangga between 20:00 - 20:30 sunday night april 26,2015. 
i saw similar object in france. with same similar shape.
content.summary: Bright lights ! changing the lights shape like triangle

content.detailedDescription: I saw this on the local news, the object seemed to stay stationary for more than 2 hours, very oddly shaped unlike any other shaped ufo i've seen, the ufo had many different colored lights ... a few seemed to bling with a patern. the local news called the military and the military "did not give an answer"
content.summary: Weirdly shaped geometric object, rectangular-square-ish. many different color lights, a few blinking ones.Seemed to stay stationary for very long period of time

content.detailedDescription: Sitting at a campfire on the bank of the muskoka river near the town of fraserburg i saw a green orb fly over the tree top about 10m in height  in an east to west direction.  the following summer sitting at same campfire saw the same green orb fly by,same direction same height this time multiple witnesses.   looked like roman candle, size of softball, very fast. direction it came from is extreme wilderness no houses or roads for 35 or 40 km . it looked exactly like a roman candle but came out of pure wilderness .Was not any kind of fireworks.
content.summary: Green orb  flew from east to west over the tree top

content.detailedDescription: Strange sphere of light witnessed by my husband and i in the sky seen from backyard in west. did not appear to be moving. pulsating red orange yellow lights. no sound from object but could hear a helicopter in distance and could see plane lights in sky in same direction of object. took video of object.
content.summary: Strange sphere of pulsating light

content.detailedDescription:
At about 2320est i was hungry and decided to make food. i started up our grill which is on a deck overlooking the northern pioneer valley. i decided to enjoy the view and listen to the deer in the woods which were spooked by my noise as i waited for the water to boil.

i looked ssw towards the lights of the active northfield mount hermon campus and noticed a bright orange orb in the sky which appeared to be hovering over the campus. i wondered what it was for approximately 30 seconds at which point the object either ascended or moved closer in distance and disappeared. i scanned the sky, noting the lack of cloud cover where the object was. i looked se and saw a smaller orb of the same orange color (noting that it wasn't in the sky before the orb disappeared). i observed this smaller orb move ene at a rate of approximately 1 degree per second for about 18 seconds before it passed behind the trees on my property. 

after this occurrence i pondered what i saw, as i made my late night meal.
content.summary: Bright orange light hovers, disappears, reappears in different part of sky, at further distance and continues on path

content.detailedDescription: 04/29/2015 10:05pm 2200hrs still there in the skie east 1500 x 110.O the objest very bright paulstating might be a meteor falling out of the sky shooting lights moved from ne to se looks like a firecracker snake when you light it expands shooting light jumping, looks like a cell fighting to grow ? might not be ufo but it is in the night ski and unadentefied very bright might be a close fly by of a (ufo) meteor, asteroid? i followed it with a small teleiscop still there now time 2233hrs.
content.summary: Like fireworks the small snakes you lite them they glow and grow and dance shooting like
